channel.title: [PI] i have a dupe problem i need help on it
channel.description:
Alright well the subject explains it ill explain how it works
you need 2 players for this dupe (its a trade dupe) the first person adds in an item they both accept it the 2nd person accepts the 2nd screen first the first player (that put in the items) thens accepts it then quickly clicks on the minimap (the player moves when you click on the minimap) to close the trade and keeps the item and the trade is accepted so now both people have the item
I want to be able to make it where you cant walk in the trade using the mini map is there a way to disable walking in a trade?

item.title: [PI] i have a dupe problem i need help on it
item.dc:creator: @Sharkboy2222 Sharkboy2222
item.description:
@Sharkboy2222 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:10, topic:409742”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=511017.msg3708271#msg3708271 date=1313181886]
Add something like

if(c.inTrade()) { resetWalkingQueue(); return; }
[/quote]
Did you try this…?[/quote]
tryed it resetWalkingQueue(); didnt work

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] i have a dupe problem i need help on it
